"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - A motivational anthem that encourages perseverance and staying true to your dreams.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - An intense and powerful song that inspires self-reflection and the pursuit of excellence.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - An empowering anthem that encourages standing up for oneself and embracing personal strength.
"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - A beautiful and uplifting song that represents hope and the promise of better times.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - A disco-era classic that symbolizes resilience and the ability to overcome adversity.
